Summary: Seen at a really high alt
divs: Sighting Details I was standing on my front porch, at around 12:30 - 1am smoking a cigarette. I was looking up at the stars, which I usually do every night. Then Out of nowhere I noticed what looked like a star moving at a really high altitude, moving really fast with a dim trail behind it, then it abrubtly changed direction, and then it just was gone like the lights were turned off. I was amazed I spend countless nights looking at the sky and the stars. It was the first time I have ever seen anything like it. I knew that it wasn't normal the second I saw it change direction the way it did and the speed it seemed to be moving at compared to the extremely high altitude was incredible.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Cookeville
There were no other sightings in Cookeville on or around February 21st 2012
